name: BrandTech.co
description:
We help late-stage startups and mid-sized companies compete with big brands by keeping them relevant in the post-digital age through the creation of customer-centered, engaging omnichannel experiences.
Our specialties include brand development, lead gen, customer acquisition, engagement/CRM, loyalty programs, go-to-market, and digital strategies (including the management of SEO and SEM for client partners).
